author: Ove
content: A had a fast look-through your book and it looks marvellous. Really nice layout too, I liked that you had used the blog titles as image captions, or was it the other way around..? Anyway, the caption numbers probably puzzles one or two readers who are not acquainted with your blog - in a positive manner, let's hope. ðŸ™‚ If not, the images speaks by them self. Really nice work, there.
